intro_text: Kits are having nightmares after hearing scary stories from some warriors. You want to comfort them with a gentle lullaby.
decline_text: You decide that your singing voice will do no good for the Clan.

success_outcomes.text: Your soothing lullaby calms the distressed kits, allowing them to sleep peacefully. The Clan praises your caring nature.

fail_outcomes.text: While your intentions are good, the lullaby doesn't seem to work for all the kits.

intro_text: An anxious queen is worried about her kit's mobility development. You offer to share some exercises that might help.
decline_text: You refer them to the medicine cat.

success_outcomes.text: The exercises you suggest seem to make a difference, and the kit shows signs of improvement. The grateful queen praises your knowledge.

fail_outcomes.text: Despite trying the exercises, there's no noticeable difference in the kit's progress.

intro_text: With more kits in the nursery than usual, there's a debate about the sleeping arrangements. You propose a new layout for the nursery to accommodate everyone.
decline_text: You decide that the old layout works for now.

success_outcomes.text: Your proposed layout works wonders, ensuring each kit and queen has enough space. The Clan is impressed by your resourcefulness.

fail_outcomes.text: The new layout causes more issues than it solves, causing some fights between kits who had confused their new designated nests.

intro_text: A kit has become fussy and refuses to eat. You're called in to assist.
decline_text: You assure the kit's parents that the kit will eat eventually and you do not need to intervene.

success_outcomes.text: You have an idea and tear up some freshkill into easy to swallow strips. The kit happily eats the prey.

fail_outcomes.text: The kit remains uninterested, turning their nose up at the prey.
